properties.name: Big Brain (Histology)
properties.description: An ultrahigh resolution 3D model of a complete human brain (20 micron isotropic resolution), developed in a collaborative effort between the teams of Dr. Katrin Amunts and Dr. Karl Zilles (Forschungszentrum JÃ¼lich) and Dr. Alan Evans (Montreal Neurological Institute). Based on 7404 digitized histological brain sections, this so far unique reconstruction provides unprecedented neuroanatomical insight. The dataset contains a complete gray and white matter classification with corresponding surface reconstructions

publications.citation: K. Amunts, A. Evans et al.: BigBrain: An Ultrahigh-Resolution 3D Human Brain Model. Science 2013
